subject: Suits and Litigation
News and News Media
Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong is being sued for more than $1.5 million by a British newspaper over the settlement of a libel action, which followed doping allegations against the cyclist that it published.
snippet: Lance Armstrong is being sued for more than $1.5 million by a British newspaper over the settlement of a libel action, which followed doping allegations against the cyclist that it published.
